name: The shape of guilt
description:
CONTENT WARNING:

Violence, blood, death and strong language. Please be advised!

A horror visual novel made for Spooktober 2021. Short, but with tension all along. My first game that I am excited to share! Here we will follow a man that is being followed by someone that looks exactly like him with a knife.

Duration: 10-15 minutes. Two endings!

Credits to:

-Adit and Notafish for basic proof-reading and edits on the writing.

-KayHitoshi for the sprites, writing and Ren'py programming.
